job.title: Sr. Software Engineer - AI Platform
job.industry: Computer Software,Consumer Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: stronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongEngages with stakeholders across teams to lead the development and maintenance of backend services and solutions to support userfacing products downstream services or infrastructure tools and platforms used across UberbrbrstronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongemIf you have production experience at scale and you want more exposure to Machine Learning at scale then we are the team for you We are a team within the Uber AI Platform better known as Uber Michelangelo that is paving the way for Datacentric ML We pioneered the use of the Uber ML Feature Store as a fundamental building block of the ML lifecycle across the industry  which powers models at Uber for training and serving at millions of QPS with very low latencies Our ongoing mission is to develop MLOps infrastructure and tools to create high quality features and labels for use in machine models with the goal of fully automating the lifecycle of feature engineering at Uber and beyond We work closely with Data Science and Machine Learning teams across Uber to develop algorithms and tooling for sharing discovery computation selection transformation and monitoring of features and embeddingsbrbremstronguMinimum QualificationsbrustrongulliPhD or equivalent in Computer Science Engineering Mathematics or related field AND 2years fulltime Software Engineering work experience OR 5years fulltime Software Engineering work experience WHICH INCLUDES 3years total technical software engineering experience in one or more of the following areasliliProgramming language eg C C Java Python or GoliliNote the 3years total of specialized software engineering experience may have been gained through education and fulltime work experience additional training coursework research or similar OR some combination of these The years of specialized experience are not necessarily in addition to the years of Education amp fulltime work experience indicated brliulstronguRequiredbrbrustrongstrongTechnical skillsbrstrongulliDistributed systemsbrliulstronguPreferredbrustrongulliProduction experience with lowlatency microservices at scale in distributed cloud environmentsliliProduction experience with scalable data processing at scale in distributed cloud environmentsliliProduction experience with feature Engineering Lifecycle in ML systemsliliProduction experience with applying Information Theory concepts in building scalable feature selection algorithmsliliExperience with building feature embeddings from high dimensional feature setsliliDemonstrated use of ML techniques in Personalization or Recommendation SystemsliliProduction experience with product engineeringliliProduction experience with scalable engineering at scale in distributed cloud environmentsbrliulAt Uber we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion We take on big problems to help drivers riders delivery partners and eaters get moving in more than 600 cities around the worldbrbrWe welcome people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to help build a future where everyone and everything can move independently If you have a curiosity passion and collaborative spirit work with us and lets move the world forward togetherbrbrUber is proud to be an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex gender identity sexual orientation race color religion national origin disability protected Veteran status age or any other characteristic protected
